description.translate: In this sleeping reality of thousand fertile precipices, mute Entropy invested of will, perceived while waking up, the ultimate destructive desire until the fall of the mountains.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§6Complice du Chaos\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§aEn cette réalité dormante de mille précipices féconds, muette Entropie investie de volonté, \"}","{\"text\":\"§aperçut en s'éveillant, l'ultime désir destructeur jusqu'à la chute des montagnes.\"}","{\"text\":\"§aIn this sleeping reality of thousand fertile precipices, mute Entropy invested of will,\"}","{\"text\":\"§aperceived while waking up, the ultimate destructive desire until the fall of the mountains.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7力§a1 §7抗§a1 §7攻速§a2 §7恢魔§a1\"}"]}}
